main event: A balloon-shaped, white trail was reported to have appeared and remained for several minutes. The object was white in color, approximately the size of a silver dollar held at arm's length and stationary at first, then changing shape or control was due to settling.
interesting points: The object was described as balloon-shaped and white in color.
The object initially appeared stationary, then changed shape or control as if it was settling.
The object was compared in size to a silver dollar held at arm's length.
The object was observed for several minutes.
The witness was unsure if the object was a balloon or something else.
